title: UNDP Climate Promise 2025
summary: Helps countries align their national climate pledges with the 1.5°C goal, supporting NDC enhancement, implementation, and finance mobilization.

title: UN Decade World Restoration Flagships
summary: UNEP/FAO-backed initiatives targeting large-scale restoration of forests, rivers, wetlands, grasslands, and coasts. Seven new flagships recognized in 2024.

title: Living Indus – Restoring Pakistan’s Lifeline
summary: Aims to rejuvenate 25 million hectares along the Indus River, combating ecosystem degradation and supporting agricultural and ecological resilience.

title: Acción Andina: Climate and Reforestation
summary: Restoring and growing 30 million trees across seven countries in the Andes to boost climate and water resilience, and community development.

title: UNFCCC Article 6 Programmes
summary: Enables countries and organizations to cooperate using international carbon markets for emissions reductions and climate investments under Paris Agreement Article 6.

title: Green Climate Fund Flagship Projects
summary: $400M+ portfolio of adaptation, forestry, energy efficiency, and transition projects enabling low-emission development across developing countries.
